Package it.polimi.ingsw.shared.messages

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.shared.messages.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The smallest unit of information that is sent from and to clients in the IO process. It's made by a type and a payload stored in JSON format
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
